pages.title: ABOUT US
pages.h1: Welcome to our Virtual Gallery Experience!
pages.content1: At ArtVista, we believe in the trans-formative power of art. Our platform is where artists and art enthusiasts from around the globe can connect, explore, and share their passion for creativity.
pages.content2: Founded in 2024, ArtVista aims to revolutionize art appreciation through a digital lens.
pages.content3: Strive to democratize art, making it accessible to everyone, everywhere. Through our platform, we aim to create a global community of artists and art lovers who celebrate creativity.

array: Immersive Virtual Galleries: Explore stunning virtual galleries from home.
NFT Artwork: Discover and collect unique NFT artworks from talented artists.
Community and Collaboration: Join a vibrant community of artists and art enthusiasts.
Accessibility: Enjoy art and connect with others, regardless of physical location.

pages.final: Join us on this creative journey! Explore, connect, and be inspired through art at ArtVista!

pages.title: Welcome to ArtVista!
pages.content: ArtVista is your ultimate platform for exploring and sharing stunning digital art. Create, upload, and showcase your artwork in our virtual gallery. Join our community to connect with fellow artists and art enthusiasts.

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.content: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy document outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected by ArtVista and how it is used.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: At ArtVista, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website artvista.com or use our services, including logging in with MetaMask and generating NFTs via OpenSea. By accessing or using our services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect the following types of information: Personal Information (Ethereum wallet address via MetaMask, email address if provided), Automatically Collected Information (IP address, browser type and version, operating system, pages visited, time and date of visit).

sections.title: How We Use Information
sections.content: We use the collected information to provide and maintain our services, facilitate transactions and NFT generation via OpenSea, communicate with you, improve our website and services, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Sharing Your Information
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as described in this Privacy Policy. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our website and provide services to you, and to comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

sections.title: MetaMask and OpenSea
sections.content: When you use MetaMask to log in, we only access your public wallet address. We do not have access to your private keys or seed phrases. MetaMask's privacy policy can be found at metamask.io/privacy.html. When you generate NFTs via OpenSea through our platform, we may interact with OpenSea's API. Any information processed by OpenSea is subject to their privacy policy, which can be found at opensea.io/privacy.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information: the right to access, update, or delete the personal information we have on you; the right to opt out of marketing communications; the right to data portability; the right to withdraw consent where consent is the legal basis for processing your information.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at privacy@artvista.com, by visiting our website at artvista.com/contactUs.
